descriptionarticle.text: Read some scanlines of data from the JPEG decompressor.

return.text: The return value will be the number of lines actually read. This may be less than the number requested in several cases, including bottom of image, data source suspension, and operating modes that emit multiple scanlines at a time.

remarks.text: We warn about excess calls to jpeg_read_scanlines() since this likely signals an application programmer error. However, an oversize buffer (max_lines > scanlines remaining) is not an error.
